text: Thézillieu is a former commune. It is in the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region in the Ain department in east France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Plateau d'Hauteville.Arrêté préfectoral , 12 December 2018 == References == Category:Former communes in Ain
title: Thézillieu
